website_summaries.verdict: This deluxe mattress offers a proven choice for men, women and children.
pros: Includes a TENCEL lyocell blend cover that is both plush and durable
Features a memory foam layer that is infused with gel beads to help you stay cool while you sleep
Boasts open cell construction that limits the risk of sagging over time
Sold in a variety of sizes
cons: Mattress layers tend to separate on their own

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this mattress, but I paid for a 12" mattress, not a 9" mattress. We set it up on Saturday morning and now four days its still only 9 1/2" tall, and even less on the corners. The corners didn't expand fully on the top and bottom and offer NO support. It's also more firm than medium firm as advertised. Maybe if it actually expanded to 12" inches it would be softer. It does have an odor, but it's not terrible and hopefully will dissipate. I've contacted the company by email to see about having it replaced, but haven't heard anything yet. Will update this review once resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Seven years old...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son as a temporary, inexpensive mattress. He slept on it for about a year, it became a gues room mattress for four years, other son came back, regular use for another two years, and it is still in great shape, everyone who has ever slept on it has loved it. I had to look it up because another friend wants to buy it for themselves. The mattress set we finally bought was 10X the price and he still likes this one better.
customer_reviews.author: L. Scribner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a few months before reviewing this mattress. I really had high hopes, but it’s only four months and I absolutely hate this mattress. The sag, despite rotating as directed, (also to note, this mattress is sooooo heavy and hard to move) is horrible. We have a platform bed frame, so that was supposed to keep that from happening. My husband and I both are small people, but it’s like lying in a sink hole every night. Back and hip pain from this mattress is horrible, but I feel we are stuck with it now until we can save up to purchase another. We will not be purchasing another memory foam/gel mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M

customer_reviews.title: Not for large people.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is fine for small built adults or children. Three years ago bought both teens full size for their rooms and they still love it. My husband and I have had ours for two years and we are not happy. First year was heaven, but after that there started to get a hump in the middle. I tried spinning, but just got my husband's indent and he was happy for a bit. Now two years and we are both uncomfortable. I was so happy the first year I almost bought this for my adult son and girlfriend, I am so glad I didn't. Don't buy unless you are a thin person or a child.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for only 4 month and I already hate it. I followed the insturctions to the letter when it arrived and It's as lumpy as your Serta or Beautyrest run-of-the-mill mattresses. Going to try to contact them directly to see if they'll honor the warrantee.
customer_reviews.author: NC Sue

customer_reviews.title: Not that plush at all!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were pretty happy to get this, as we slept on another memory foam mattress that my cousin purchased at Costco and slept very comfortably. But after having this Lucid mattress for a few weeks, we are wondering why it is so uncomfortably firm. We opted for the medium plush, but it doesn't feel that way on our lower backs. Waking up with back pain is terrible, and if this was not so hard to return, I would do just that and keep looking. Very disappointed in this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Started Out  Well
customer_reviews.text: This mattress seemed like it was going to be the one when I purchased it 2014...well at least for the first 2-3 yrs. After that the foam became "soggy" and unsupportive and now my wife and I frequently wake up with back pain. contact with warranty support revealed that the "25 year warranty" advertised requires a photo with a broom stick placed across an empty mattress to show problems, Seriously! How does the procedure suggested by product support depict the poor support or defect in the foam we are experiencing without seeing how it is when occupied. I see why they changed the warranty to 10 years, but I doubt they'll honor that either.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved this bed. It felt like my spine was completely aligned while sleeping. I also felt cool. My husband hated it and said it was too hard. 2.5 years later and I’m not loving it. I have rotated the mattress probably more than necessary to get even wear on it. Well now I feel like I sleep in a dip/hole every night and get sore from sleeping like this. I feel like even though it wasn’t a very expensive mattress, the memory foam should’ve held up a lot longer than it has.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Lego

customer_reviews.title: It is terrible. I’m not sure what to do about it
customer_reviews.text: I just unpacked and set up this mattress and the first thing I noticed was the chemical smell. It is terrible. I’m not sure what to do about it. If anyone knows please let me know. I bought a Dynasty mattress last year and love it. I should have just got another one. I have had my first night sleep on this Lucid and every time I woke up which was a lot I could smell the chemically stink of the mattress. Unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed!
customer_reviews.text: We were definitely apprehensive of purchasing a bed that we never had slept on or touched. This bed has met all our expectations and is very comfortable. I was waking up with back pain and aches in our old bed and this has been eliminated with this bed. I sleep on my stomach and my wife sleeps on her back and this bed has provided comfort to both of us for a solid night's rest. We have had this bed now for 8 days, I will follow up after some more time has passed but I highly doubt my review will change.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, but not a medium-plush.
customer_reviews.text: Yes mattress comfort is subjective, but the amount of 'sink' you get in a memory foam mattress is measurable, and this one does not measure as a medium-plush by any means. The return policy cost you half the price of the mattress, so don't expect to be able to 'try it out'. They were able to credit me enough to buy a memory foam topper, so it's no all bad. Just be aware this is NOT a medium-plush
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D Guertin

customer_reviews.title: unbalance memory mattress
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this memory foam mattress. It took more than a week to delivered even on Prime. I had it on the floor first because i was waiting for my bed. It slop down in the middle, the top and bottom are higher. Today i got my bed and put it on a level frame, it still slop down in the middle. I threw all the box away and couldbt return it. So disappointed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: SISLEY NGUYEN

customer_reviews.title: Too Firm but well made
customer_reviews.text: This is my second LUCID mattress. I loved the first one I bought a few years back, but when I decided to get a larger bed, that particular model was no longer available. I ordered this one requesting a MEDIUM comfort level and a MEDIUM-FIRM level was shipped and received. I decided to give it a try. I ended up waking with shoulder pain (I typically sleep on my side). My husband also complained of back and neck aches. I was afraid to order a soft because I wanted a little support. I ended up ordering a mattress topper (also a LUCID) and I finally have the comfort level I was expecting -- unfortunately it cost me another $100.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schaub

customer_reviews.title: Too soft for me
customer_reviews.text: I personally found this mattress too soft for me. My mom on the other hand liked it and I ended up giving it to her. I'm 5'3 100 pounds so I clearly don't weigh much. I tried sleeping on my back and sides and after an hour my body sunk into the mattress and I had back pain in the morning. The mattress did open up properly and the measurements were as described. If you like a plush bed this mattress is for you. It was my fault I should not have bought the plush...I'm giving it 4 stars overall because for the price I think it would be great if you want a softer mattress
customer_reviews.author: natasha bailey

customer_reviews.title: Very firm - I dont sleep well on this mattress
customer_reviews.text: I got this mattress in July and I haven’t sleep well since... Maybe I ordered a firm mattress but this thing is not comfortable to sleep on. My brother got a Lucid mattress and loved it but mine is too firm. It also weighed like 100 pounds and was a pain to lug up to my second floor apartment. Just ordered a topper to see if that helps, but really dissatisfied with this memory foam mattress.
customer_reviews.author: fieldsoflavender

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, especially considering the cost
customer_reviews.text: I cannot for the life of me figure out why showroom mattresses are so much more expensive than the ones you find online. We're looking at around a 50% cost reduction, and I expected to pay for that in quality. I'm happy to report that I was wrong, and that it feels awesome. Furthermore, I worried that picking a mattress out without trying it was asking for trouble, but some online research turned up some statistics indicating that people were slightly happier if they didn't try a mattress out before - likely because the feel alters after being broken in and after laying down for a while
customer_reviews.author: Mattador

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Firm
customer_reviews.text: You wouldn't think a memory foam mattress that comes rolled up would be such high quality, this one is. It certainly rivals anything I've ever purchased in a mattress store. It's a bit on the firm side for me...actually it's very firm. I tend to have to turn over several times at night because I get sore. I would have preferred something softer. I'll probably put a mattress topper on it. Though, I've had it for a few months and it hasn't been a priority.
customer_reviews.author: Twilli

customer_reviews.title: Great bed overall for what it is and the price
customer_reviews.text: Sure you can spend thousands on some crazy mattress, but why when you can get this bed for a few hundred and it works perfectly. Even if it needs to be replaced in 2 years due to sagging or something, it is still more cost effective and it is better because its a fresh bed every two years. Replace every 8? No thanks I prefer more often. Overall, this bed is great at relieving my back pain and it doesn't transfer motion so I do not wake my spouse when I get up early and she sleeps in another 3 hours. Its not the most comfortable bed ever, but it is quite comfy. I recommend you try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T.

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress on a Gold Box deal for $309 and I was a little worried about the mattress I would receive. The mattress arrived via UPS in a square boxed rolled up and I followed directions allowing 48 hours for the mattress to expand. Once I put it in place and slept on it, all my fears went away. The mattress is soft, yet firm in nature providing a great night of sleep. I am normally a light sleeper who gets hot after sleeping in the same spot during the night. This did not happen after sleeping on the mattress and I had a great night of sleep. Construction is excellent and I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: This mattress sags eventually- I am disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After 4 years, the mattress sags where the lower back is. They wanted me to take a lot of pictures, but my aching back would not allow me to move it. They asked I lay a pipe/ broom across it to show how even it is. I can show my fingers under the pipe, while taking these pictures. My back is in agonizing pain. I am usually very positive of my purchases, but this is not expected of a 25 year life after years I have spoken the truth of the quality of the mattress. It sags eventually. My foundation is a solid, heavy base. The last pic is what the edge look like- steady and firm.
customer_reviews.author: Washti

customer_reviews.title: Firmer than expected
customer_reviews.text: Unpacking was easy. Let it rest to fully expand for the recommended 48 hours. Mattress expanded to 11.5 inches. What little odor there was dissipated within 24 hours. I've slept on the mattress for about a week. It is firmer than I expected. The memory foam gives a couple of inches to fit the shape of your body but there isn't much give in the other layers of foam. My back feels supported and I have less pain than prior to sleeping on the mattress...I will update the review in a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best Memory Foam Mattress on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: We've purchased several memory foam mattresses over the years, replacing several less expensive ones with higher quality as we could afford to and as our children outgrew twin beds. We needed a twin mattress to set up a bed for my older mother downstairs, now that she can not handle the up and down of the second story guest bedroom. This mattress is so wonderful AND inexpensive, that we are replacing our own king size mattress next. It has a more expensive memory foam mattress now which is only a couple years old and not half as comfortable. What a great price for this level of quality.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Plush Medium = Zero support and tons of sag
customer_reviews.text: I have to lay perfectly in the middle of this twin mattress if I don’t want to roll off the bed. It holds no weight on the edges and sinks down 6-8 inches when sitting or laying on the edge. When I ordered plush medium, I thought it would be comfy but have support. This is neither. I don’t know if I got a faulty mattress or what. And there’s no way for me to get it boxed up for an exchange. Super disappointed I just wasted hundreds of dollars. 2 Stars for fast delivery, minimal off gas smell and it raising to 12”
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S

customer_reviews.title: 5 years later, still a great night's sleep
customer_reviews.text: I've been sleeping on this mattress for five years now and it is still going strong. Living in Florida, I can confirm that this bed does not get warm like some other foam mattress. Definitely plush but not too plush - I generally like a firm bed, but the foam core in this mattress offers me plenty of support. The only reason I'm rating 4 stars is that after five years it is just now starting to show signs of being a bit sunken in where I typically rest. Nothing too serious, but I can kind of feel it if I roll over just the right way. For the price of this thing, you really can't get a better value
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I was really nervous about purchasing this. First I like a soft bed but hate feeling trapped because of sinking in to far. This is very comfy but I can still roll over without feeling like I am trying to make a great escape. Also, I am heavy and was concerned it would not support me properly and I would feel pressure points. I have had this for about a month. I can't believe how much I like this bed. I use it on an adjustable bed and have no issues with dipping. Plumps right back. No pressure points and I feel cooler than I did with my last memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Borman

customer_reviews.title: Quality. Comfortable. No odor.
customer_reviews.text: I would describe this mattress as medium firm. It has just enough “give” to accommodate the curvature of one’s spine. Super comfortable. It took 24 hours to fully expand to 12 inches high. Surprisingly, there was no foul offgassing odor. I was expecting something terrible, like the memory from am mattress I purchased from Sleepy’s many years ago. This mattress from Lucid had absolutely no odor whatsoever. I am very impressed with the quality of this affordable bed, which will be used to quarantine a family member who works in an assisted living facility with COVID-19 patients. Tough times.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer27

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now
customer_reviews.text: Okay y’all, You can stop right here. This is the one. I looked up and down reviews and spent about 4 hours picking our new mattress. I’m blown away by how much we enjoy this mattress. It’s soft, but firm. It sucks in your body, but offers support. It’s dog approved, as our pup has been lounging on it non-stop. Just, like, stop now and buy this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Seriously the best mattress ever
customer_reviews.text: Legitimately the BEST mattress we have ever owned, even over significantly more expensive models. We actually slept on this bed first at a spectacular BnB, and slept so well that we asked the owner for the details on this mattress to buy one for ourselves. It was very easy to set out, inexpensive, and is truly one of the best purchases we have ever made. We are buying another for my mother’s beach house, and will be recommending Lucid to everyone in the future!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: LUCID has fine products
customer_reviews.text: Ur expanded right away with no odor. Is expected thickness. I sink in more than I like so I put a fairly thick yoga mat atop it the over that a high quality quilted mattress pad/topper then fitted sheet. The bed is high and I like it. I used a twin size in a double foundation. I live the arrangement and can move the twin size a lot easier for flipping and changing sheets. I put my reading materials to the side of my twin mattress. I do like LUCID. It is the second mattress I’ve purchased from this company
customer_reviews.author: Jodie D.

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months we found mold!
customer_reviews.text: This bed was fine, nothing special but perfectly good for how inexpensive it was. However, we went to rotate it for the first time tonight and saw mold on the box spring. So we stood it up to see the bottom and there was mold on the cover and on the mattress itself. Nothing visible on top, but the bottom side has mold spots over a 2ft. by 2ft area right in the middle. We have no mold anywhere else in the house and have no moisture issues. We don't live in a humid climate, etc. I've just been reading other reviews that say Lucid won't cover mold--hope this isn't true because we only got 6 months out of it.
customer_reviews.author: LisaAC

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price. Skip the encasement.
customer_reviews.text: Baby on the way and I needed a King mattress for cheap. Lots of internet mattresses these days and I tried fairly hard to decipher all of the information before just... pulling the trigger of this one. It's firm, it doesn't smell weird, and it's as nice as any mattress I've ever owned. I purchased the encasement for fear of all the stains headed my way, but it pretty much ruins this mattress; zero breathability and sounds like a giant diaper under the sheets. The only reason I can think to own the encasement is for protection while moving. For a first time dad, a big dude, and a cheapskate -- this is a solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: MSA

customer_reviews.title: Buy cheap, replace every five years.
customer_reviews.text: Got this in 2012. It had a twenty five year warrantee for what it’s worth. It was great for several years. Eventually, it began to get softer and form valleys in each partner’s place. Used with adjustable base. Don’t know how much that affected wear. Bottom line: cost $500. It is now 8 years later, and we are buying a replacement for under $300. Buying a mattress with a firm rated bottom core foam. Foam mattresses/couches get softer and lose their shape over time. The higher the core foam density rating, the longer it will perform. Forget 25 years or 10 years. Spend $300, and toss it a few years from now when it loses its support.
customer_reviews.author: Will G

customer_reviews.title: Mother In-Law
customer_reviews.text: Bought the bed for my mother in-law. The family decided it was time for her to be in assisted living facility. She was not happy but she was really excited about her new bed. My husband and I are certain it helped her a little bit with the move. She LOVES the bed. She is 88 years old & not techy at all. This was the best bed for her. My sister in-law slept on it when she came to visit her & she was very impressed with the bed. I was expecting the bed to be more costly but it was a great price & was easy to set up when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Decent mattress for the price
customer_reviews.text: After a year+ of owning, I still like this mattress, but I have some issues with it. It does not break in uniformly is my biggest complaint. One side of the bed sinks in, while the other side is still pretty firm. The edges stay nice and firm compared to the rest of the bed, so you will find yourself migrating to the middle of the bed. I would also suggest getting a mattress pad as the mattress itself now has a smell from absorbing sweat. I expect to be purchasing another mattress in a couple years based on current condition.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Neubecker

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price. So comfy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality bed. I actually was able to give it to a friend for her air bnb rental, after using it for four years, she thought it was too new. I flipped it and turned it like every 6 months just to keep it from doing what I know mattresses tend to do. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Short life span
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about two years. I had it for a little less than 3. The last year totally screwed my back over. The gel sinks over time and you end up getting no support. This was an awesome mattress for the first two years but if you plan to keep it longer then I wouldn't recommend it. Two stars because it fell well below the lifespan stated and that it degraded so fast that my back didn't have a chance to adapt unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Yasser

customer_reviews.title: So far not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Was 9inches within a couple hours with little smell not bad I waited the 48 hrs before sleeping on it and it expanded to 11 inches. Not sure yet if it hit the 12 specified. I recommend putting it in the right place before inflating as I had it upside down and it is really heavy to flip alone lol I have to get used to the sinking feeling when sleeping on it but haven't had any restless nights so I'll say so far it's good to go I'll update on size and comfort again later
customer_reviews.author: Edgar VanTassel jr.

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable bed!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been sleeping on this for about a year and it is super comfortable. I went from an expensive spring mattress and this by far is a better sleep. My back feels better and be careful because this bed will make you fall asleep because it is so comfortable so if you aren’t ready to sleep don’t lay on it! Also I was worried that it would be too hot to sleep in and that it wouldn’t breath but I’ve had no issues I use a mattress protector of mold and allergens and also 100 percent cotton sheets and it’s been a great night sleep since.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Save up for the real thing if you want long term comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Performs well, for a little while. The first 8 months or so were great then it began to compress. Just a few years later it is very lumpy. I'm on it right now and it feels like I'm trying to lay on a hillside. I've rotated it, maintained it, to look at the naked mattress, it looks pristine but I haven't had a comfortable night's sleep for many months. 4.5 years after purchasing this mattress, I'm ready to trash it. Memory foam mattresses are not all created equal. There's a reason that big brand name one is the best. This would make a good guest-room mattress but it isn't a good investment as a primary mattress.
customer_reviews.author: astrahl

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelmed
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine highly recommended this mattress to me. Mine is really hard and doesn’t have any of the softness I was expecting from a “medium plush”. Just trying to adapt to it and to the lower back pain I wake up with when I sleep in it. The mattress plumped up fully in about two to three weeks. Shipping was fast. The firmness/hardness was not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L Bensel

customer_reviews.title: One side sunk in less than a year!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress thinking that it wouldn't sink like a regular spring mattress. After about a year I started feeling a dented area on one side (the side I used to get in and out of bed) and after about two years I had to turn the mattress around from head to toe. You're not supposed to flip memory foam mattresses so I could only turn it around. I'm extremely disappointed because I was so comfortable when I first got it but now my back is in so much pain. I basically had to get a new mattress and I just used this one for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Great... up until three years in.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this mattress over three years now ... I wanted to wait a bit before I gave a review. Mattress is great, but over time it will start to dip in the space(s) where you sleep. Especially if you are heavier. I am about 230 pounds. I’ve had to rotate the mattress in order for me to get the quality of sleep I was getting when I first bought the mattress back in November 2016. My next purchase will mostly NOT be this brand of mattress due to that...I’ve had better quality foam type mattresses that have lasted much longer than this without any dips.
customer_reviews.author: krazyguy786

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mattress in 2015, it was pretty good the first year. Since then we have constantly rotated it regularly but it just has gotten worse and worse.. now to the point where we both are waking up in pain.. There isn't a firm spot on the mattress. I have reached out to Lucid about their "amazing warranty" they provide but it is basically impossible to get them to honor it. Luckily this thing was only $350 so not a huge loss.. if you want something cheap to get you by for 12 months go for it.. otherwise, keep shopping!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Can't get back into box.
customer_reviews.text: UPS would not take mattress back because we could not get it back in the box. This is a memory foam you need a shrink wrap machine to get back in the box. Unfortunately I don't own a shrink wrap machine.
customer_reviews.author: nikoson

customer_reviews.title: Best Mattress Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress. I have a queen and it is super soft. It is like sleeping on clouds but it is supportive. I had a Tempur Pedic cloud collection before and it sucked so bad I sent it back and it cost like $5k. For the couple hundred bucks this mattress costs it is totally worth it. I would never go back to spring mattresses. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.. not amazing though
customer_reviews.text: Not awful. I did a gross amount of research and became a mattress expert level 10.. decided to go with this one. Maybe should have gone a touch thicker or with the additional plush, it’s good, soft and firm at the same time. Edges do get a bit soft, hard to get up more of a roll out of bed. No indents yet but notice a difference on my wife’s side when we switch. 4 / 5 maybe overall.. would probably go with a diff one next round
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased! Didn’t take long to get to full fluff. We ordered the plush version as we like a really soft bed. It’s becoming softer as we sleep on it. It continues to improve every night. Very happy with this purchase so far. Update (1 month): We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Yes this is a firmer mattress (i ordered medium) I think gel memory foam mattresses are firmer than a traditional innerspring anyway but this has been great! My husband at first was like it's really hard but after 2 or 3 nights we broke it in. I sleep super hot (I'm also currently 8 months pregnant so hot is an understatement) and I've had less nights where I've woken up from being hot than I did with our traditional mattress! We do have the recommended mattress encasement as well as cotton sheets (very soft and breathable) and a nice light comforter, all of which i'm sure helps! I highly recommend this mattress it has been a GREAT investment thus far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress in 2013 and I have body indents on it, it dosen't matter if I turn it or flip it which it's not flippable, had a Simmons before this mattress that lasted 18 years, I guess what they say is true, you get what you pay for. And I should mention that I'm only 140 lbs Update: called the company was told to take a picture and to put a ruler on it so they could see the indent, well it looks fine when your not on it but when your on it your in a hole. Do not waste your money on this piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Mattress sagged bad in middle from the start
customer_reviews.text: Directions say give 48 hrs after unpacking for memory foam to regain its memory. After 7 days we saw not noticeable difference and at least 3 in of sag in the middle. Mattress comes folded in a box and is supposed to regain its shape. This one did not. Before buying, we slept on a lucid, less plush, at a VRBO. It was very comfortable and perfectly flat. We are returning, that was easy, and I will probably try their less plush 10"; hoping it is more resilient in regaining its memory.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Really great mattress. The last mattress I bought was for $800+ in 2010 and this mattress is better than that. I unpackaged this at 3 pm and slept on it by midnight because it was at full size and I was just dying to; and what a great nights sleep it was. I would recommend this to anyone with back problems. It’s firm by nature but feels soft to the touch if that makes sense. The scent of the mattress and packaging were gone before 24 hours in my opinion, especially with sheets. All in all very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: rob2shell

customer_reviews.title: Too soft Too be true
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this mattress for 4 months now and let’s just say it’s comfortable, however it’s extremely soft and I literally sink in the mattress every single day, no matter what. This mattress is not to sit on or lounge. If you’re not going to sleep, do not get on mattress. I sleep well, but it’s hard to get out of the bed whenever I need to get up and it’s because I am sunk in the mattress. Lol I have to roll out of the bed instead of sit up and get out. But. I’m glad I got it because now I know that I don’t like soft mattresses. I need a firm soft situation.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Best bed I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: We got this bed along with a 3" cooling topper 9 months ago. We are so happy with this bed. We had to sleep on the bed the first night without the topper and found it very firm, I like firm but even I felt so much more comfortable with the topper on it. Plus doing it that way we saved money over buying the thicker matress and the topper was only about $100 so in a few years if need be that will be much cheaper to replace than having to replace the mattress itself. Stop searching just put ot in your cart.
customer_reviews.author: Kitt Fairy

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but you will sweat your sack off.
customer_reviews.text: I only sleep on this matress a week a month as I keep it at my apartment in California. Anyways. Fairly comfortable I think, I have a queen in my son's room. Bought because they were cheap. Anyways, everytime I came to CA I would absolutely sweat my balls off. To the point of where I thought there was something wrong with me. I mean the fever sweats where you wake up so soaked that you're hot but cold. So this last trip I asked my son if he gets hot at night and he said he sweats like he's never sweat before. Conclusion: comfortable but be ready to sweat
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous for your health
customer_reviews.text: Dangerous for your health. A week in and my back hurts so bad from it sagging 6-8 inches lower where I am laying. The scary part is I have been waking up every night 1-3 times with my arms and legs asleep bc the bed messes up my blood circulation. I have to crawl out onto the floor then shake my arms and legs to get the blood flowing. It has been causing nightly panic attacks bc of this.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Soft, soft sofft- problem rectified!
customer_reviews.text: So sooooft....nothing close to the description given on the product before I bought it. I have slept on it for 3 and a half months and it only gets worse not better. I wish it was returnable!! Update: I got intouch with Lucid and they were able to replace the mattress with a much firmer one, that is a vast improvement on the previous one. Customer service was top notch!! Thank you Lucid.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Forms holes where you sleep...
customer_reviews.text: We had this for not even 2 years before we were buried in the holes where we sleep. I'm a petite woman and my husband is tall but not wide. I would NOT recommend this. There is no contact info to follow up on advertised 10 year warranty and we aren't even close! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBean

customer_reviews.title: $379 every 5 years ain’t bad.
customer_reviews.text: Here’s the deal. Is this the most awesomest mattress EVER when it’s new? A resounding, YES!! Does it break down over time and become less comfy. Again, yes. Ours last about 5 years before there’s a jump near the middle between where I and my husband sleep. My line of thought is though, $379 for a king mattress every 5 years is a STEAL!! And you get a brand new mattress ever 5 years!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Nutter

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BUY YOU WON'T REGRET!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO happy with this mattress. We purchased a full size for my four year old. It's GREAT!!! It is still in process of deflation. It is firm yet soft and comfortable so far PERFECT BUY!!! THANK YOU! ❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤Any bad reviews I'm lost to as why I couldn't be more happy with this mattress and the price you can't beat it! It feels the same as my daughters bed and that cost 900.00 We will purchase another king size as we need to get a new one. I now know where to get a GREAT mattress for more then half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: Had this bed for over a year, I weigh 190 and my wife 130, both sides of the bed are feeling different, mine sinks in more and hers just isn’t as comfy either. from my understanding foam is not suppose to do that but I may be wrong I guess, debating on trying a new company or reaching out to lucid to see about there lifetime warrenty they have cause sleep isn’t as good anymore as it was at the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Will S

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!  Good Sleep.  Good covering material - should last 5+ yrs.
customer_reviews.text: Returned the firm mattress for this one PLUSH. Make sure you get the plush as its also relatively firm. Easy unpack...roll it out and cut plastic...air then makes mattress rise...fully formed in 10-20 minutes. Good product and value for the money. I also very much appreciate Amazon returning the original as it was my mistake purchasing firm one as I received wrong info from friend who purchased similar.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Morris

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price but not the comfiest
customer_reviews.text: We had a 15 year old mattress that was killing our backs. I bought this mattress bc I couldn't afford a "real" one (so to speak) and I had enough amazon gift cards to get this. As is, it wasn't that comfortable; we had a foam covering for our old mattress that we put on this one which made it much better. I don't have the back pain anymore but I can't say its the best mattress I ever slept on either. I guess for the price-you can't beat it for a king sized mattress. No bad smell as others have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress but is for warm sleepers.
customer_reviews.text: Very Very nice, we love this mattress. It is very important for these mattresses to feel right to buy a true platform base. The ones with solid base boards, without individual slated boards. The slated boards base types Do Not support the mattress correctly. Update! this mattress is for people who like to sleep warm. It retains heat if you do not like to sleep warm, I suggest using a fan at the foot of the bed or one of the cooling devices that circulates air under the sheet. I hate sleeping warm and this solved my problem. However , if you have back trouble this mattress is great but again it retains heat.
customer_reviews.author: Choochoo

customer_reviews.title: Mattress sags within first 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: For the first year it was comfortable. After that it started sagging on the sides and I sleep close to the edge so I almost fell off the bed several times. I can't find any info on getting it replaced through the warranty. It definitely is a workmanship issue due to not having any side support. I do not recommend this mattress nor will I buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley J.

customer_reviews.title: BEST mattress ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am 8 months pregnant and my back has been in excruciating pain. Last night was the first night I slept in WEEKS. I got the 12inch plush feel king. I am in heaven and never want to leave this bed ever again. It’s affordable, gets shipped right to your home, and is extreme quality! The mattress I was sleeping on was $2000+! Don’t waste your money or time getting any other mattress. I work at a vacation rental company and we use these mattresses in almost every single home. Our guests email us all the time requesting what mattress we use. This is why I even tried it. I’m not disappointed in the least!
customer_reviews.author: dalton c.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: So just got it unwrapped and there is a bit of what I can only assume is dried grease on the end. Nothing I can't overlook. But then I see the size listed on the box "37.5 in. X 79 in." Which leads me to conclude that the listed size of the Twin XL 80 X 39 is in fact fictitious. The box clearly states "37.5 in. X 79 in." as apposed to the 80 X 39 I ordered. Going to give it a night and see whether it's worth keeping or whether the hassle of returning would be worth it. Will update.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Everyday

customer_reviews.title: Finally.... The Perfect Mattress
customer_reviews.text: We have been trying to find the perfect mattress and finally we found it in this one! We previously had a pillow top which was uncomfortable and so we added a memory foam topper. With both of those it was so heavy and tall we couldn't enjoy it. We got rid of both of those and got the Lucid and love it. Ordering, delivery and set up was easy. We opened it and let it expand in our living room for a couple of days. It was easy to move into the bedroom using the plastic that came with it and the smell was very faint and gone after a couple of days. Would order this again in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.author: Tianna J

customer_reviews.title: I was concerned with buying a mattress over the internet ...
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned with buying a mattress over the internet without seeing,touching or feeling it. With it being cheaper than all the other beds in a box I decided to try it and would do it again in a heart beat. It was a little bulky but my 19 year old 100 lb daughter was able to get it in the house by herself. Although it said to open it and wait 48 hrs for it to expand and air out, it only took about 3 hrs to expand with no odor and my wife and I slept on it that night.
customer_reviews.author: snorkler

customer_reviews.title: WoW incredible!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely thee best mattress! My bed is a 1930s chestnut wood with headboard and footboard. I measured carefully because I didn't want it to not fit. My bottom is good ole wood slats that lay horizontally and there is an inner rim on the sideboard's. Well 12 inches fit like a glove! Super easy to install because as you pull the plastic away, the mattress begins to unfold and rise on it's own. I have NEVER had a better night's sleep...it literally conforms to my every position. And Amazon by far, has the best price 😊
customer_reviews.author: NorCalgal

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware! read their warranty before purchase and this only lasts for up to 2 years before you will need to replace it.
customer_reviews.text: Had this mattress for a few years now and while it has a long warranty they will NOT let you use the warranty as if there is even a spot on the mattress (had it covered since we got it in a second zipper waterproof breathable cover) they will not replace the mattress as it has a little bit of staining on the mattress. The reason we wanted to replace it is it breaks down and after around 2 years of use the thing is overly soft and at about 5 years you are left with a very indented unconformable bed. I will never buy any Lucid products again unless I hate the person I am buying it for :)
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Look around. Read long term reviews.
customer_reviews.text: My first review was after 3 months 5 stars... All well but after 21 months this mattress is a piece of junk. No stars. none. The memory foam remembers where the lumps and bumps should be. It puts them in the same place. It looks perfect. No stains. No Mark's. Just lumps. No Lucid won't do anything about it. The say... you get what you pay for Sad:!
customer_reviews.author: Ken in The Villages

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Just right . You sink in just enough, yet the bed is supportive. It isn’t plush in the traditional sense. I say medium. I wanted something Supportive yet soft. I bought the Lucid 2 inch lavender infused memory foam topper for it and it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tropical breeze

customer_reviews.title: Room for me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress in 2012 size queen. My dog, two cats and I slept very well for almost five years. I added a husband and one more cat and found there was no more room for me. I needed a bigger bed. Loving this mattress and never having any issues, I moved the queen into the spare bedroom and bought a Lucid 14 inch in king size. Now WE are all happy. Thank you Lucid for making great mattress. I have a feeling we will be looking in crib size soon. ;).
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love this mattress, best ever!
customer_reviews.text: I don't care what these bad reviews say, I love this mattress. I had such bad back and hip pain (chronic) I did go see a chiropractor, but then we got this mattress. It's so comfortable, I don't feel any movement from my husband and it does not may me hot. It actually feels a little cool. I don't sink in the edge of the bed when I sit on it. The mattress doesn't wrinkle at all. It cradles your body but does not constrict you. I do not have any back or hip pain anymore and I don't wake up in pain or stiff. Love this mattress, highly recommend purchasing one for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is reasonably comfy
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is pretty soft and comfy for what it is, but my neck and back pain have increased since using it. Since there are no springs it has no bounce back, which for me makes it hard to get comfortable because as soon as you lay down you sink into the mattress and stay there. Also had a very strong chemical smell when opened.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia M.

customer_reviews.title: 4 years is the best you'll get
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, read the long term reviews. It starts out fine, but no matter how you treat it, it will eventually break down and sag. Smaller people may be ok, but anyone over 200 pounds is eventually gonna have a bad time. I am 5 years in and it is just bad. I won't repurchase this brand - I'll just go for something cheaper if I am going to burn through them ever 4-5 years. They're comfortable, until they aren't. Certainly better than coil mattresses. Get a firm, flat foundation to start and just understand you aren't going to have the same mattress for 20 years anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: No durability
customer_reviews.text: This was a great mattress when we first got it, but as other reviewers have stated it doesn’t have the same support after only 1 year. I am roughly 180 lbs, my wife is about 120 lbs and we sink into the middle and it’s killing our lower back. I can’t believe this can’t even hold up for more than one year. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ricky grant

customer_reviews.title: Medium but more on the firm side.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, when you first lay on it, it might feel hard but then your body start to sink in and it feels amazing. If you don't like firm beds then this is not for you. This is a medium but i feel it's a little more on the firm side.
customer_reviews.author: CV91

customer_reviews.title: This bed is just so damn comfortable that I can't hate it
customer_reviews.text: This bed is just so damn comfortable that I can't hate it. Sure it does slant to one side, but damn my fat ass is pretty much cemented to one position with as far as I am in the bed. The bed might be better with some support, but I just have it on the floor and it is good enough. I used to have back problems, but after a week, I stopped noticing my back and the pain was pretty much gone after 2 weeks. If you don't get this bed, then I recommend you get memory foam mattress. I don't think I will be able to sleep on anything other than a foam mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Santos

customer_reviews.title: Sorry, not a fan..
customer_reviews.text: MUCH too firm for what is supposed to be a MED-FIRM mattress. I am as side sleeper and I have never experienced as much back/neck and side pain as I have with this mattress. It only takes about 2 hours before I just can't take the pain anymore. It is being removed from the bed today and I will go back to my 10 yr old mattress until I can find something better. Happy for you if this mattress works for you, but it did not for me.
customer_reviews.author: AtomicPunk

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: When the couch became more comfortable than my old mattress with topper, I decided it was time for a change. I have always slept better on a somewhat softer mattress. Tried a sleep number bed but had some problems. Ordering blind is a little scary, but the Lucid medium feel seemed like the best option so I went for it. Absolutely blissful comfort and support and zero issues with memory foam being overly hot as some have reported. Crawl in bed and Ahhhh! Extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: S Rymph

customer_reviews.title: OMG this is wonderful to sleep on
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is wonderful to sleep on. If you are a plus size person this is a great investment. I love a firm bed,but not an extremely firm bed. I brought this as a guest bed. I have not slept in my pillow top spring bed since I purchased this mattress. I am going to purchase one for my bedroom. Also make sure you invest in a good bed frame like zinus is also for plus size people. My advise is to do your homework on mattresses and bed frames for plus size people. I did these came in fourth place. The others mattresses was very costly. I am proud of my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce T.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing bad to say!!! Amazing mattress!!!
customer_reviews.text: I pulled the trigger on this mattress after finding a YouTube video that broke down in detail which Amazon mattresses were good and which level of firmness best fit sleeping habits. THIS MATTRESS IS GREAT!!!! I have the second to last on the firmness level so mine is pretty firm but the best part is no matter how firm the mattress is when u lay on it it slowly lets u sink into it. Its not too hot and it’s pretty easy to set up just be careful to step away from the mattress when cutting plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela

customer_reviews.title: Real review after some wear...
customer_reviews.text: Going on 5 years with this bed. Overall its pretty good. Especially for the price, I have a Serta, Sleep innovations that no one in my family can sleep on. Compared the 2 beds and this Lucid is far better. Side sleeping is the best position, for me... All of these beds are probably the same. The difference is the 10"/12" in foam. The more the better. Edit* This is after the 5th year and this mattres needs to GO. As others have noted it has started to sag. Not enough for their "broomstick 1.5" test, but enough to notice. I suppose you get what you pay for. Going to try Wink. Not through Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: evan long

customer_reviews.title: Never fully inflated and other memory foam issues, Amazon was great!
customer_reviews.text: Mattress never inflated to the full 12 inches as advertised and one of the corners has a visible dip. The majority of the mattress after 6 days was roughly between 10 to 10.5 inches. Mattress was comfy and after reading some reviews online about other mattresses I would confirm that this mattress has similar issues ie, Very little support along the edges of the bed as you really sink off. Additionally, this mattress definitely runs hotter than a spring mattress. Even in the winter, I woke up sweating. Amazon was great though and refunded me immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress and odor was not that bad
customer_reviews.text: 2 yrs ago we bought this same mattress (full size) and the odor from it was horrible!! We had to air it outside the house for a few days and a few more days in another room before actually using it. To our surprise, this King size we just purchased did have an odor but it wasn't that bad (not as bad as the full size) . We received this mattress about 5 days before the bed frame arrived so it was just sitting in the empty room with windows open. By the time we used it , there was minimal odor. We also ordered the malouf mattress cover for this item. My wife and I really like the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Chivas

customer_reviews.title: Why Spend 1k on a Mattress EVER?
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is so amazingly comfortable. A bit more firm than I would have imagined as I'm used to my many years old spring mattress, but doesn't bother me one bit. It is sooo comfortable and really conforms to your body. The sleep is amazing too. I honestly could not imagine spending so much on a mattress when I got this one for half the price. I think it ended up being 11 inches rather than 12 but whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Recommend Not To Buy
customer_reviews.text: I recommend not buying from this company. I recommend purchasing from a company such as Casper that allows you try out mattress or switch mattress. Once you purchase a mattress you’re stuck with it
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: For the price. I would definitely give this mattress 4 stars. I am pregnant, and was having terrible back, hip and shoulder pain at night and a very difficult time sleeping. I would wake up so sore every morning. We ordered this and got free 2 day shipping with a free trial of prime. Such a great deal!!! I am very happy with the purchase. I am sleeping so much better and waking up pain free :) The only thing I would caution is that it is a little on the firm side, but still very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Secrest

customer_reviews.title: Not for daily use of an adult!
customer_reviews.text: Followed the inflation instructions, after about 30 days it started saging so I rotated it. It was good but when I rotated it again it was never the same. I have had horable back pain, leg and arm numbness ever scense. I am a side sleeper at 6' 230 lbs so that's not good, but after less than a year I have to replace it. The link listed does not seem to be a company website, and after seeing the warentee reviews it is likely hopeless. I think my new one has 100 day trial, so I will set a timer to return it if needed. Back sleeper <140 lbs might be fine or a child.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too firm.
customer_reviews.text: I got the full size for my sons bedroom. He is seven. It is fine for him, and he likes it. I was hoping to like it enough to order one for ourselves. We had recently bought a Casper and I thought if I liked his bed enough I would return the Casper and get this and save a lot of money. But in this case I could not do it. The mattress was way too firm. If you are a side sleeper I do not recommend this bed for an adult. May be OK if you sleep on your back or your stomach. But just be warned it is very firm.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Grandy

customer_reviews.title: The dreaded divot.
customer_reviews.text: We have one on each side. We are not big people, but after 4 years of use, it feels like I'm sleeping on a 10+ year old bed. At first it was a dream. I had the flu a few weeks ago and with my severe body aches, this bed made me cry. I don't know if it has the requisite 1.5" divot needed to enact the warranty, but I'd be lying if part of me didn't enjoy the nights I get to sleep in the middle of the bed when my husband is out of town.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good night sleep
customer_reviews.text: Owner was very happy with the purchase of this LUCID 12 Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress-Triple Layer-4 Pound Density Ventilated Gel Foam-CartPurt-US Certified-25 Year Warranty-Full (what a title!), and says that like so many other reviewers stated, this is an above average purchase, specially at the price point if one is going to accept the impressive discount the manufacturer claims in the title, almost like 70%? Did notice that the price increased days after by about $30 more, so that became an extra reason for being very happy with the purchase. Looks very good together with the Sleep Revolution Platform Bed in where it rests. Nice bargain for a very comfortable Mattress. 4.5 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Wannabee

customer_reviews.title: Using for two years and still happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress two years ago and after using it for that long, I can honestly say I still love it. I have a very solid frame under it and I rotate it every month. I have not experienced any sagging, lumping or indentations in the mattress. I’m a regular size person ( 5.7 - 165 lbs.) Many other members of my family have purchased same mattress & I have never heard a complaint. For me, this was a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Freethinker

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is a complate JOKE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my mattress January of 2017 and recently (7/30/19) contacted customer support about a warranty replacement. I sent all the pics they required showing the "sag" just to be told that they won't replace any mattress until the "sag" is 1.5 inches. The bed wasn't bad until recently and I personally think they should disclose in their information that no warranty replacement until there is a sag greater than 1.5 inches. That basically means they expect you bed to sage at least 1.5 inches and they know it will happen. With only the top 4 inches of the bed being actual memory foam they expect almost a 50% sage in the most important part of the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Dog19

customer_reviews.title: Very firm but proving good sleep!
customer_reviews.text: So far we like our king size mattress. I am used to a softer bed and this is definitely more firm than I am used to. But I have been sleeping really well and not waking up several times a night like before. When my husband gets home late from work I don’t even feel the mattress move when he gets in bed. We might eventually get a topper to make it softer, but so far the mattress is great
customer_reviews.author: CJ Maestas

customer_reviews.title: It has a good firmness to it that provides just the right amount ...
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying my new mattress. It has a good firmness to it that provides just the right amount of support. I do feel I need to get more supportive pillows now to match the firmness of the mattress. I like that it contours to the body without feeling like your sinking into a certain position. I recommend this product. I've been sleeping on it for about 3 weeks now. The price is fair for what you get. :)
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Custodio

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've been sleeping on this for a few months now. I love it! It's firmer than I expected, but I adjusted quickly. My hips sink in enough to be comfortable without giving me arnt back pain. I sleep very well on this mattress. I never smelled it as some people have complained. I set it up and slept in the extra bedroom for a couple days to let completely fluff up. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy McGrady

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: When you first take this out of the package, it doesn't look like much. But once it inflates it is amazing. I got this because I moved to a new state and wanted something cheap in case I end up moving back. This $400 mattress is wayyy more comfortable than my $1200 Serta that I had back home. Would highly recommend taking the chance.
customer_reviews.author: DaBus

customer_reviews.title: Memories are made of this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a replacement for my guest bedroom on the main floor. This winter was an extremely frigid one and upstairs is heated only via vents in the ceilings. I decided I would sleep downstairs one minus 20 degree night. That was four months ago and I tried to return upstairs last week. Nope, not going to happen. This mattress has spoiled me. It's comfort has so surpassed the one upstairs,I can't return upstairs. The only solution will be to purchase a gel memory foam for the upstairs bedroom, but that can wait...I have this one.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Sheppard

product_meta.title: LUCID 12 Inch Gel Infused Memory Foam Mattress - CertiPUR-US Certified - 10-Year Warranty - Queen
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Style:2019 Model Medium MattressThe LUCID 12 Inch Memory Foam Mattress has a medium feel that combines a soft comfort layer and the support of high-density base foam. The 3 inch ventilated gel memory foam top layer is softer and lighter than other memory foams. LUCID foam adjusts to your individual pressure points to relieve shoulder, neck, and back pain. Memory foam also helps to isolate motion transfer between sleep partners. The bottom layer is 9 inches of high-density base foam that offers deep support. The soft TENCEL blend cover creates a breathable air layer at the top of the mattress. Our foam is CertiPUR-US certified, which means it has been independently tested for safety of materials used, physical performance, and environmental stewardship. Careful construction guarantees no prohibited phthalates, no ozone depleters, no CFCs, no mercury, no formaldehyde, no PBDEs, and low emission (VOCs) for indoor air quality. All our products are shipped vacuum-packed, so your mattress is easy to transport and setup. After your mattress arrives, simply take the package into the right room, remove it from the box and protective wrap, and then watch as it expands. Mattress cover may vary from picture in pattern and color

Medium feel is just right, not too firm or too soft, so you and your partner can sleep in comfort

Built to relieve pressure by supporting the natural curves of your head, neck, and shoulders
Ventilated top layer and TENCEL blend cover ensure a breathable sleep environment
